a garden plant grown for its large, attractive leaves and groups of light purple or white flowers: Hosta species vary in size and foliage colour. Hostas need a minimum of 2 cm of water a week from rain or watering.
More examplesFewer examplesThe foliage on hostas is more stunning when contrasted wisely.Growing hostas in containers allows for more control.One of the most useful and beautiful shade-loving plants is the hosta.Make sure the bottom of the pot is in the water, so your hostas don't dry out.
